description:
This is the seventh class in the World Religions series. In this lesson we will take a look at the history of Mormonism. We will establish a basic timeline so that you can understand when and how Mormonism was founded. We will also highlight the most important points in the history of Mormonism. We will be discussing:

  • The life of Joseph Smith
  • The finding of the golden plates
  • The translation of the plates
  • The compilation of the Book Of Mormon

We will also begin to take a look at how Mormonism compares to Christianity and other religions. We hope you will join us for this exciting and informative class and that you will gain the knowledge you need to understand this religion.
title: 207  -  A History of Mormonism
